title: Voting With Your Middle Finger
description: There is one truth that has endured through the first two years of Donald Trump's presidency: he has kept the support of the core voters who propelled him to the White House. This week on Hidden Brain, we explore two competing perspectives on the motivations of Trump supporters, and what they can tell us about the state of our union.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
